004/**
005 * The SDK provides support for the usage of the GraphQL endpoint. As GraphQL is a query language itself
006 * the SDK can't map the responses to a class model automatically.
007 *
008 * {@include.example example.GraphQLTest#graphql(com.commercetools.api.models.product.Product)}
009 *
010 * In case a result model class exists the class reference can be given to the execute method so that
011 * the response will be mapped accordingly.
012 *
013 * {@include.example example.GraphQLTest#graphqlMapToClass(com.commercetools.api.models.product.Product)}
014 */
015public class GraphQL {
016}
